enWisdom: Doubt is the fruit of ignorance
The most abased of people is the sceptic

Wisdom: أَهْلَكُ شَيْ‏ءٍ الشَّكُّ وَالِارْتِيَابُ وَأَمْلَكُ شَيْ‏ءٍ الْوَرَعُ وَالِاجْتِنَابُ
enWisdom: The most destructive thing is doubt and uncertainty, and the most constructive thing is piety and keeping aloof from sin

Wisdom: دَعْ مَا يُرِيبُكَ إِلَى مَا لَا يُرِيبُكَ
enWisdom: Abandon that which causes you to doubt for that which does not cause you to doubt
The worst matters are those that are the most dubious

Wisdom: مَنْ أَخْيَبُ مِمَّنْ تَعَدَّى الْيَقِينَ إِلَى الشَّكِّ وَالْحَيْرَةِ
enWisdom: Who can be more of a failure than the one who crosses [over] from certainty towards doubt and perplexity?

Wisdom: مِنْ شَقَاءِ الْمَرْءِ أَنْ يُفْسِدَ الشَّكُّ يَقِينَهُ
enWisdom: It is from the wretchedness of a person for his certitude to get corrupted by doubt
Keeping away from suspicion is from the best magnanimity
